1.title: Personal zh
1.description: Please enter in your personal information zh

2.title: Academic zh
2.description: Please enter in your academic information zh

info.title: Important Information
info.body1: Application is on a rolling basis. Once your application is submitted, you will be notified of your application status within 10 business days.
info.body2: For those under the age of 18, please note that you will be required to receive parental or guardian consent. You will receive a follow up email with an online document to be signed and returned before you are paired with a mentor.
info.body3: Please note that we reserve the right to deny any applications.

success.title: 您的申请已经提交成功
success.body: 您将收到一封确认电子邮件，其中包含更多详细信息和后续步骤。期待与您会面！
